energy.usef.core.service.validation

Class CorePlanboardValidatorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • energy.usef.core.service.validation.CorePlanboardValidatorService

  • public class CorePlanboardValidatorService
extends Object
    Validation service class containing the role-independant planboard validations.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorePlanboardValidatorService()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkPtuPhase(FlexOfferRevocation flexOfferRevocation, Map<Integer,PtuFlexOffer> flexOffers)
      Throws a BusinessValidationException if one of the PTU phases in flex offers is operate state or later.
      void checkRelatedFlexOffersExist(FlexOfferRevocation flexOfferRevocation, Map<Integer,PtuFlexOffer> flexOffers)
      Throws a BusinessValidationException if flexOffers is empty.
      void checkRelatedPlanboardMessagesExist(FlexOfferRevocation flexOfferRevocation, List<PlanboardMessage> planboardMessages)
      Throws a BusinessValidationException if planboardMessages is empty.
      boolean hasPlanboardItemPtusInOperatePhase(Document planboardItem)
      This methods checks whether a planboard item (all the documents of the same type with the same sequence number) has one of its PTUs in the operate phase already.
      boolean isPlanboardItemWithingIntradayGateClosureTime(Document planboardItem)
      Checks whether a planboard entry is not saved if within the gate closure time (amount of PTUs from the start of the operate phase).

      Verify whether PTU Container is within IntradayGateClosureTime.

      Validates the currency against the configured currency.

    • Method Detail

      • isPlanboardItemWithingIntradayGateClosureTime

        public boolean isPlanboardItemWithingIntradayGateClosureTime(Document planboardItem)
        Checks whether a planboard entry is not saved if within the gate closure time (amount of PTUs from the start of the operate phase).
        Parameters:
        planboardItem - Document planboard entry.
        Returns:
        true if the planboard entry is too close to the operate phase.

      • isPtuContainerWithinIntradayGateClosureTime

        public boolean isPtuContainerWithinIntradayGateClosureTime(PtuContainer ptuContainer)
        Verify whether PTU Container is within IntradayGateClosureTime.
        Parameters:
        ptuContainer - PTU Container
        Returns:
        true if the PTU Container is within IntradayGateClosureTime, false otherwise

      • hasPlanboardItemPtusInOperatePhase

        public boolean hasPlanboardItemPtusInOperatePhase(Document planboardItem)
        This methods checks whether a planboard item (all the documents of the same type with the same sequence number) has one of its PTUs in the operate phase already.
        Parameters:
        planboardItem - Document a planboard item.
        Returns:
        true if at least one of the PTUs for a document of the same type with the same sequence number is in operate phase. false otherwise.

      • validateIfPTUForPeriodIsNotInPhase

        public void validateIfPTUForPeriodIsNotInPhase(String usefIdentifier,
                                               org.joda.time.LocalDate period,
                                               PtuContainerState... phaseTypes)
                                        throws BusinessValidationException
        Check's if not all ptu's in this period are in the requested phases. For Example: to check if there is still a ptu in the period of a received FlexOffer that is not in PENDING_SETTLEMENT or SETTLEMENT.
        Parameters:
        usefIdentifier -
        period -
        phaseTypes -
        Throws:
        BusinessValidationException
